description: A daily timeline of events from the federal corruption trial of Dean G. Skelos, the former State Senate majority leader, and his son, Adam.
title: Highlights From the Trial of Dean and Adam Skelos
title_page: Highlights From the Trial of Dean and Adam Skelos  - The New York Times
maintext:
State Senator Dean G. Skelos, the former Republican majority leader, and his son, Adam, were found guilty of using the senator’s official position to obtain for the younger Skelos more than $300,000 in “bribes, gratuities and extortion payments” from campaign donors and people with business before the state.
(Full coverage of the Skelos’s trial and Sheldon Silver’s trial.)
A timeline of events from the Skelos’s trial:
